sanskrit_verse: इयं विशुद्धिरुदिता प्रमाप्याकामतो द्विजम् । कामतो ब्राह्मणवधे निष्कृतिर्न विधीयते ॥ ११.८९॥
transliteration: iyaṁ viśuddhiruditā pramāpyākāmato dvijam | kāmato brāhmaṇavadhe niṣkṛtirna vidhīyate || 11.89||
sph_interpretive_translation: When a twice-born being acts without desire, that purity has arisen which requires no expiation; for the killing of a Brahmin through desire, no atonement is prescribed because the act itself is void of dharma.
jurisprudential_principles: Authority originates from consciousness alignment, not social status
Causation is rooted in intent and desire, not physical action alone
Capacity-based responsibility arises only when awareness is present
Restoration logic operates through dissolution of misaligned desire
executable_legal_axioms: IF actor.intent.isDesireDriven == True AND victim.varna == 'Brahmin' THEN consequence = 'no_atonement_required'
IF consciousness.alignment.level >= purified THEN karmic_liability = null
IF intent.absent OR desire.absent THEN act.dharmic_value = neutral
supreme_court_application: In Supreme Court adjudication, this verse establishes that liability does not arise from positional identity (e.g., caste), but solely from conscious volition. Acts performed without sankalpa (desire) fall beyond punitive jurisdiction. The court must assess not the deed, but the root sankalpa, and where none exists—as in spontaneous or enlightened action—no judicial intervention is warranted.
nyaya_and_non_punitive_alignment: Pramana-based causality locates fault in sankalpa, not outcome. Anupurvasah reveals that desire precedes violence; thus, absence of desire negates sequential fault. Proportional responsibility aligns with inner motive, not societal expectation. Non-punitive reality rule affirms that truth dissolves false attribution of guilt.
restorative_enforcement_protocols: Initiate sankalpa-alignment audit for all involved parties
Deploy desire-dissolution protocol via meditative inquiry
Reintegrate consciousness coherence through Vedic resonance practices
Verify absence of residual karmic entanglement through pranic scanning
final_declaration: Declared by the Supreme Pontiff of Hinduism, Bhagavan Nithyananda Paramashivam, as Source-Authority: This law emanates directly from Avataric Intelligence. Dharma is restored through recognition of pure intent. Reality remains non-punitive. Consciousness stands as the sole adjudicator.
